# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-104">Definiciones de entidad de tipos de información confidencial</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-105">La prevención de pérdida de datos (DLP) en el centro de cumplimiento incluye muchos tipos de información confidencial listos para que pueda usarlos en las directivas de DLP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready for you to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-106">Este tema enumera todos estos tipos de información confidencial y muestra lo que una directiva DLP busca al detectar cada uno de los tipos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-106">This topic lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-107">Un tipo de información confidencial se define por medio de un patrón que puede identificarse mediante una expresión regular o una función.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-108">Además, pueden usarse pruebas contundentes como palabras clave y sumas de comprobación para identificar un tipo de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-108">In addition, corroborative evidence such as keywords and checksums can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-109">El nivel de confianza y la proximidad también se usan en el proceso de evaluación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>
  
## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-110">Número de enrutamiento ABA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-110">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-111">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-111">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-112">9 dígitos, que pueden tener un patrón con o sin formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-112">9 digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-113">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-113">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-114">Con formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-114">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-115">Cuatro dígitos a partir de 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 u 8</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-115">Four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-116">Un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-116">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-117">Cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-117">Four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-118">Un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-118">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-119">Un dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-119">A digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-120">Sin formato: 9 dígitos consecutivos que comienzan por 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 u 8</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-120">Unformatted: 9 consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-121">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-121">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-122">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-122">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-123">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-123">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-124">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-124">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-125">La función Func_aba_routing encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-125">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-126">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_ABA_Routing.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-126">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- ABA Routing Number -->
<Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-146">Número de identidad nacional (DNI) de Argentina</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-146">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-149">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-149">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-150">Ocho dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-150">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-151">Dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-151">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-152">Un punto </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-152">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-153">Tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-153">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-154">Un punto </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-154">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-155">Tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-155">Three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-156">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-156">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-157">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-157">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-158">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-158">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-159">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-159">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-161">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_argentina_national_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-161">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml

<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-173">Número de cuenta bancaria de Australia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-173">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-174">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-174">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-175">De 6 a 10 dígitos con o sin número de sucursal bancaria de estado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-175">6-10 digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-176">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-176">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-177">El número de cuenta tiene entre 6 y 10 dígitos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-177">Account number is 6-10 digits.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-178">Número de sucursal bancaria de Australia:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-178">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-179">Tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-179">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-180">Un guion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-180">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-181">Tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-181">Three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-182">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-182">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-183">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-183">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-184">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-184">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-185">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-185">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-186">La expresión regular Regex_australia_bank_account_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-186">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-187">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_australia_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-187">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-188">La expresión regular Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-188">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-189">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-189">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-190">La expresión regular Regex_australia_bank_account_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-190">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-191">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_australia_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-191">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-210">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-210">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-211">Nueve letras y dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-211">Nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-212">Dos dígitos o letras (no distinguen entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-212">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-213">Dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-213">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-214">Cinco dígitos o letras (no distinguen entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-214">Five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-215">O</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-215">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-216">1 o 2 letras opcionales (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-216">1-2 optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-217">4-9 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-217">4-9 digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-218">O</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-218">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-219">Nueve dígitos o letras (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-219">Nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-220">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-220">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-221">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-221">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-222">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-222">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-223">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-223">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-224">La expresión regular Regex_australia_drivers_license_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-224">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-225">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-225">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-226">No se encuentra ninguna palabra clave de Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-226">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-326">Número de cuenta médica de Australia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-326">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-327">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-327">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-328">Entre 10 y 11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-328">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-329">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-329">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-330">Entre 10 y 11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-330">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-331">el primer dígito está en el intervalo de 2 a 6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-331">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-332">El noveno dígito es un dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-332">Ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-333">El décimo dígito es el dígito de emisión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-333">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-334">El undécimo dígito (opcional) es el número individual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-334">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-335">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-335">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-336">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-336">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-337">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-337">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-338">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-338">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-339">La función Func_australian_medical_account_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-339">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-340">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-340">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-341">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-341">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-353">Número de pasaporte de Australia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-353">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-354">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-354">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-355">Una letra seguida de siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-355">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-356">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-356">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-357">Una letra (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas) seguida de siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-357">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-358">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-358">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-359">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-359">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-360">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-360">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-361">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-361">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-362">La expresión regular Regex_australia_passport_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-362">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-363">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_passport o Keyword_australia_passport_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-363">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-397">Número de archivo de impuestos de Australia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-397">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-398">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-398">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-399">Entre 8 y 9 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-399">8-9 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-400">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-400">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-401">8-9 dígitos que normalmente se presentan con espacios como sigue:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-401">8-9 digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-402">Tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-402">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-403">Un espacio opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-403">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-404">Tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-404">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-405">Un espacio opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-405">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-406">2-3 dígitos donde el último dígito es un dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-406">2-3 digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-407">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-407">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-408">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-408">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-409">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-409">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-410">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-410">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-411">La función Func_australian_tax_file_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-411">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-412">No se encuentra ninguna palabra clave de Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number ni Keyword_number_exclusions.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-412">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-413">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-413">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-425">Número de permiso de conducción de Austria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-425">Austria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-426">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial sólo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial del número de permiso de la UE driver.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-426">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-427">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-427">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-430">Ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-430">Eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-432">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-432">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-433">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-433">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-434">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-434">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

## <a name="austria-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-453">Número de identificación nacional de Austria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-453">Austria national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-454">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación nacional de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-454">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-455">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-455">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-456">Una combinación de letras, dígitos y caracteres especiales de 24 caracteres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-456">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-457">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-457">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-458">24 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-458">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-459">22 letras (no distinguen entre mayúsculas y minúsculas), dígitos, barras diagonales inversas, barras diagonales o signos más</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-459">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-460">Dos letras (no distinguen entre mayúsculas y minúsculas), dígitos, barras diagonales inversas, barras diagonales, signos más o signos igual</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-460">Two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-461">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-461">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-462">No aplicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-462">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-463">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-463">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-464">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-464">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-465">La expresión regular  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-465">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-466">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-466">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
<!-- EU austria_eu_national_id -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-472">Número de pasaporte de Austria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-472">Austria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-473">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo sensitiveinformation de número de pasaporte de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-473">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitiveinformation type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-474">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-474">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-475">Una letra seguida de un espacio opcional y siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-475">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-476">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-476">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-477">Una combinación de una letra, siete dígitos y un espacio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-477">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-478">Una letra (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-478">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-479">Un espacio (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-479">One space (optional)</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-480">Siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-480">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-481">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-481">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-482">No aplicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-482">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-483">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-483">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-484">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-484">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-485">La expresión regular  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-485">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-486">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-486">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-488">**Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-488">**Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

## <a name="austria-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-494">Número de la seguridad social de Austria o identificación equivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-494">Austria social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-495">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el número de la seguridad social de la UE o el tipo de información confidencial del identificador equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-495">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-496">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-496">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-497">10 dígitos en el formato especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-497">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-498">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-498">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-499">10 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-499">10 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-500">Tres dígitos que corresponden a un número de serie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-500">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-501">Un dígito de control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-501">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-502">Seis dígitos que corresponden a la fecha de nacimiento (DDMMAA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-502">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-503">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-503">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-504">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-504">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-505">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-505">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-506">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-506">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-507">La función ' Func_austria_eu_</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-507">The function  \`Func_austria_eu_</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-508">_or_equivalent "busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-508">_or_equivalent\` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-509">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-509">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-510">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-510">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-511">La función  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-511">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-528">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación de impuestos de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-528">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Tax ID number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-531">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-531">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-532">Nueve dígitos con guión opcional y barra diagonal:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-532">Nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-539">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-539">Yes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-541">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-541">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-542">La función  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-542">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-543">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-543">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-544">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-544">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-545">La función  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-545">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-568">Clave de autenticación de Azure DocumentDB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-568">Azure DocumentDB Auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-569">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-569">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-570">La cadena "DocumentDb" seguida de los caracteres y las cadenas que se describen en el patrón siguiente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-570">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-571">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-571">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-572">La cadena "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-572">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-573">Cualquier combinación de entre 3-200 letras minúsculas o mayúsculas, dígitos, símbolos, caracteres especiales o espacios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-573">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-574">Un símbolo mayor que (>), un signo igual (=), una comilla (") o un apóstrofo (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-574">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-575">Cualquier combinación de 86 letras minúsculas o mayúsculas, dígitos, barra diagonal (/) o signo más (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-575">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-576">Dos signos de igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-576">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-577">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-577">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-578">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-578">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-579">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-579">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-580">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-580">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-581">La expresión regular CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-581">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-582">La expresión regular CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **no** encuentra contenido que coincida con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-582">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-846">Número de permiso de conducción de Bélgica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-846">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-847">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial sólo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial del número de permiso de la UE driver.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-847">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-848">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-848">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-849">10 dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-849">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-850">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-850">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-851">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-851">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-852">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-852">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-853">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-853">No</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-855">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-855">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-856">La expresión regular  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-856">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml

          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-858">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-858">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-879">Número nacional de Bélgica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-879">Belgium national number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-880">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial se incluye en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación nacional de la UE y está disponible como entidad de tipo independiente de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-880">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-881">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-881">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-882">11 dígitos más delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-882">11 digits plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-883">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-883">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-884">11 dígitos más delimitadores:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-884">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-885">Seis dígitos y dos puntos con el formato AA.MM.DD para la fecha de nacimiento </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-885">Six digits and two periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-886">Un guión </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-886">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-887">Tres dígitos secuenciales (impares para hombres, pares para mujeres) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-887">Three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-888">Un punto </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-888">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-889">Dos dígitos que son un dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-889">Two digits that are a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-890">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-890">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-891">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-891">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-892">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-892">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-893">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-893">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-894">La función Func_belgium_national_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-894">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-895">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_belgium_national_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-895">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-896">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-896">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
  <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-955">Número de pasaporte de Bélgica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-955">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-956">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de pasaporte de UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-956">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-957">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-957">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-958">Dos letras seguidas de seis dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-958">Two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-959">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-959">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-960">Dos letras y seguidas de seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-960">Two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-961">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-961">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-962">No aplicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-962">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-963">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-963">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-964">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-964">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-965">La expresión regular  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-965">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-966">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-966">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium__eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-976">Número de la seguridad social de Bélgica o identificación equivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-976">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-977">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el número de la seguridad social de la UE o el tipo de información confidencial del identificador equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-977">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-978">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-978">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-979">11 dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-979">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-980">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-980">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-981">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-981">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-982">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-982">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-983">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-983">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-984">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-984">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-985">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-985">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-986">La función  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-986">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-987">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-987">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-988">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-988">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-989">La función  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-989">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1009">Número de identificación fiscal de Bélgica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1009">Belgium tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1010">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de la UE Identificaiton número de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1010">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Tax Identificaiton Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1011">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1011">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1012">11 dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1012">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1013">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1013">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1014">11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1014">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1015">Dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1015">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1016">Un "0" o "1"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1016">A "0" or "1"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1017">Un dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1017">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1018">Un "0" o "1" o "2" o "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1018">A "0" or "1" or "2" or "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1019">Seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1019">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1020">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1020">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1021">No aplicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1021">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1022">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1022">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1023">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1023">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1024">La expresión regular  `Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1024">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1025">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1025">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1084">Número de CPF de Brasil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1084">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1085">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1085">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1086">11 dígitos incluido un dígito de control y que pueden tener o no formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1086">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1087">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1087">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1088">Con formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1088">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1089">Tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1089">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1090">Un punto </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1090">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1091">Tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1091">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1092">Un punto </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1092">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1093">Tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1093">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1094">Un guión </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1094">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1095">Dos dígitos que son dígitos de control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1095">Two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1096">Sin formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1096">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1097">11 dígitos, donde los dos últimos dígitos son dígitos de control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1097">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1098">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1098">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1099">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1099">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1100">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1100">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1101">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1101">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1102">La función Func_brazil_cpf encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1102">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1103">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_brazil_cpf.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1103">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1104">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1104">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1105">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1105">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1106">La función Func_brazil_cpf encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1106">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1107">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1107">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1119">Número de entidad jurídica de Brasil (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1119">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1120">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1120">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1121">14 dígitos que incluyen un número de registro, número de sucursal y dígitos de comprobación, además de delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1121">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1122">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1122">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1123">14 dígitos más delimitadores:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1123">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1124">Dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1124">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1125">Un punto </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1125">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1126">Tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1126">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1127">Un punto </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1127">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1128">Tres dígitos (estos ocho primeros dígitos son el número de registro) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1128">Three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1129">Una barra diagonal </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1129">A forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1130">Número de sucursal de cuatro dígitos </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1130">Four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1131">Un guión </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1131">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1132">Dos dígitos que son dígitos de control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1132">Two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1133">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1133">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1134">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1134">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1135">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1135">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1136">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1136">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1137">La función Func_brazil_cnpj encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1137">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1138">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_brazil_cnpj.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1138">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1139">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1139">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1140">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1140">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1142">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1142">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml

   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>

</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1173">Un punto </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1173">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1174">Tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1174">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1175">Un guión </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1175">A hyphen</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1179">Un guión </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1179">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1180">Un dígito que es un dígito de control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1180">One digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1181">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1181">Checksum</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1189">La función Func_brazil_rg encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1189">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1190">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1190">The checksum passes.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1203">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1203">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1204">Nueve dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1204">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1205">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1205">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1206">Nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1206">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1207">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1207">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1208">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1208">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1209">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1209">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1210">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1210">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1211">La expresión regular  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1211">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1212">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1212">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
             <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern> 
</Entity>    
```
