## <a name="bulgaria-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1231">Número de identificación nacional de Bulgaria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1231">Bulgaria national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1232">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación nacional de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1232">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1233">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1233">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1234">Diez dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1234">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1235">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1235">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1236">Diez dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1236">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1237">Seis dígitos que corresponden a la fecha de nacimiento (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1237">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1238">Dos dígitos que corresponden a la orden de nacimiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1238">Two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1239">Un dígito que corresponde al género: un dígito par para macho y un dígito impar para hembra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1239">One digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1240">Un dígito de control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1240">One check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1241">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1241">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1242">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1242">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1243">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1243">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1244">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1244">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1245">La función  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1245">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1246">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_bulgaria_national_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1246">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_national_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1247">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1247">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1248">La función  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1248">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1293">Número de pasaporte de Bulgaria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1293">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1294">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de pasaporte de UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1294">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1295">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1295">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1296">Nueve dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1296">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1297">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1297">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1298">Nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1298">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1299">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1299">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1300">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1300">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1301">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1301">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1302">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1302">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1303">La expresión regular  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1303">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1304">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1304">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1305">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1305">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1306">**Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1306">**Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1311">Número de identificación fiscal de Bulgaria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1311">Bulgaria tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1312">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación de impuestos de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1312">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1313">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1313">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1314">Diez dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1314">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1315">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1315">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1316">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1316">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1317">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1317">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1318">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1318">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1319">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1319">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1320">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1320">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1321">La función  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1321">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1322">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1322">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1323">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1323">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1324">La función  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1324">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1369">Número de cuenta bancaria de Canadá</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1369">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1370">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1370">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1371">Siete o doce dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1371">Seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1372">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1372">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1373">El número de una cuenta bancaria de Canadá contiene siete o doce dígitos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1373">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1374">Un número de tránsito de cuenta bancaria de Canadá es:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1374">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1375">Cinco dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1375">Five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1376">Un guion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1376">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1377">Tres dígitos o</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1377">Three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1378">Un cero "0" </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1378">A zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1379">Ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1379">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1380">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1380">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1381">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1381">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1382">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1382">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1383">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1383">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1384">La expresión regular Regex_canada_bank_account_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1384">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1385">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_canada_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1385">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1386">La expresión regular Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1386">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1387">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1387">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1388">La expresión regular Regex_canada_bank_account_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1388">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1389">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_canada_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1389">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1413">Número de permiso de conducción de Canadá</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1413">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1414">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1414">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1415">Varía según la provincia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1415">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1416">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1416">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1417">Varios patrones que cubren Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Terranova y Labrador, Nueva Escocia, Ontario, Isla del Príncipe Eduardo, Quebec y Saskatchewan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1417">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1420">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1420">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1421">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1421">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1422">La función Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1422">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1423">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1423">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1424">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_canada_drivers_license.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1424">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1560">Número de servicio de salud de Canadá</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1560">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1561">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1561">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1562">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1562">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1563">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1563">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1564">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1564">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1565">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1565">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1566">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1566">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1567">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1567">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1568">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1568">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1569">La expresión regular Regex_canada_health_service_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1569">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1570">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_canada_health_service_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1570">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1582">Número de pasaporte de Canadá</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1582">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1583">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1583">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1584">Dos letras mayúsculas seguidas por seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1584">Two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1587">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1587">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1588">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1588">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1589">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1589">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1590">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1590">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1591">La expresión regular Regex_canada_passport_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1591">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1592">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_canada_passport_number o Keyword_passport.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1592">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1622">Número de identificación sanitaria personal de Canadá (PHIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1622">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1623">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1623">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1624">Nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1624">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1625">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1625">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1626">Nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1626">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1627">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1627">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1628">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1628">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1629">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1629">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1630">Una directiva DLP está 75% segura de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres: la expresión regular Regex_canada_phin encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1630">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1631">Se encuentran al menos dos palabras clave de Keyword_canada_phin o Keyword_canada_provinces..</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1631">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found..</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1664">Número del seguro social de Canadá</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1664">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1665">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1665">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1666">Nueve dígitos con guiones opcionales o espacios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1666">Nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1667">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1667">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1668">Con formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1668">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1669">Tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1669">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1670">Un guion o un espacio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1670">A hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1671">Tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1671">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1672">Un guion o un espacio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1672">A hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1673">Tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1673">Three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1674">Sin formato: nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1674">Unformatted: Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1675">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1675">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1676">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1676">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1677">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1677">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1678">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1678">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1679">La función Func_canadian_sin encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1679">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1680">Al menos dos de cualquier combinación de lo siguiente:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1680">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1681">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_sin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1681">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1682">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_sin_collaborative.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1682">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1683">La función Func_eu_date encuentra una fecha en el formato de fecha correcto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1683">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1684">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1684">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1685">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1685">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1686">La función Func_unformatted_canadian_sin encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1686">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1687">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_sin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1687">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1688">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1688">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1713">Número de tarjeta de identidad de Chile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1713">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1714">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1714">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1715">7-8 dígitos más delimitadores, un dígito de control o una letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1715">7-8 digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1716">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1716">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1717">7 u 8 dígitos más delimitadores:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1717">7-8 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1718">1 o 2 dígitos </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1718">1-2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1719">Un punto </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1719">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1720">Tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1720">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1721">Un punto </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1721">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1722">Tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1722">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1723">Un guión </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1723">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1724">Un dígito o letra (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas) que es un dígito de control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1724">One digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1725">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1725">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1726">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1726">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1727">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1727">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1728">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1728">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1729">La función Func_chile_id_card encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1729">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1730">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_chile_id_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1730">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1731">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1731">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1732">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1732">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1733">La función Func_chile_id_card encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1733">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1734">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1734">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1749">Número de tarjeta de identidad de residente de China (PRC)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1749">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1750">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1750">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1751">18 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1751">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1752">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1752">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1753">18 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1753">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1754">Seis dígitos que son un código de dirección </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1754">Six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1755">Ocho dígitos en forma AAAAMMDD que son la fecha de nacimiento </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1755">Eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1756">Tres dígitos que son un código de pedido </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1756">Three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1757">Un dígito que es un dígito de control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1757">One digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1758">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1758">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1759">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1759">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1760">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1760">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1761">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1761">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1762">La función Func_china_resident_id encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1762">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1763">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_china_resident_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1763">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1764">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1764">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1765">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1765">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1766">La función Func_china_resident_id encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1766">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1767">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1767">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1780">Número de tarjeta de crédito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1780">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1781">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1781">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1782">de 14 a 16 dígitos que pueden ser formateados o sin formato (dddddddddddddddd) y que deben pasar la prueba Luhn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1782">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1783">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1783">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1784">Patrón muy complejo y robusto que detecta las tarjetas de todas las principales marcas en todo el mundo, incluidas Visa, MasterCard, tarjeta Discover, JCB, American Express, tarjetas regalo y tarjetas diner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1784">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1785">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1785">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1786">Sí, la suma de comprobación de Luhn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1786">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1787">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1787">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1788">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1788">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1789">La función Func_credit_card encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1789">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1790">Una de las siguientes opciones es verdadera:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1790">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1791">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_cc_verification.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1791">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1792">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_cc_name.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1792">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1793">La función Func_expiration_date encuentra una fecha en el formato de fecha correcto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1793">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1794">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1794">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1795">Una directiva DLP está segura al 65% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1795">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1796">La función Func_credit_card encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1796">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-1797">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-1797">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2057">Número de permiso de conducción de Croacia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2057">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2058">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial sólo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial del número de permiso de la UE driver.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2058">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2059">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2059">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2060">Ocho dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2060">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2061">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2061">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2062">Ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2062">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2063">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2063">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2064">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2064">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2065">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2065">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2066">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2066">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2067">La expresión regular  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2067">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2068">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2068">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2084">Número de tarjeta de identidad de Croacia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2084">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2085">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial se incluye en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación nacional de la UE y está disponible como entidad de tipo independiente de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2085">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2086">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2086">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2087">Nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2087">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2088">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2088">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2089">Nueve dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2089">Nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2090">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2090">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2091">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2091">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2092">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2092">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2093">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2093">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2094">La función Func_croatia_id_card encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2094">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2095">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_croatia_id_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2095">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2126">Número de pasaporte de Croacia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2126">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2127">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de pasaporte de UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2127">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2128">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2128">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2129">Nueve dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2129">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2130">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2130">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2131">Nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2131">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2132">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2132">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2133">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2133">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2134">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2134">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2135">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2135">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2136">La expresión regular  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2136">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2137">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2137">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2144">Número de identificación personal de Croacia (OIB)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2144">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2145">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2145">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2146">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2146">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2147">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2147">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2148">11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2148">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2149">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2149">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2150">El dígito final es un dígito de control para el intercambio internacional de datos, se agregan las letras h antes de los once dígitos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2150">Final digit is a check digit For the purposes of international data exchange, the letters HR are added preceding the eleven digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2151">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2151">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2152">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2152">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2153">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2153">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2154">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2154">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2155">La función Func_croatia_oib_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2155">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2156">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_croatia_oib_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2156">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_oib_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2157">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2157">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2158">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2158">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2159">La función Func_croatia_oib_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2159">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2160">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2160">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
<Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_oib_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2167">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el número de la seguridad social de la UE o el tipo de información confidencial del identificador equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2167">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2168">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2168">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2169">11 dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2169">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2170">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2170">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2171">11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2171">11 digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2173">Un dígito de control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2173">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2174">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2174">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2175">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2175">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2176">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2176">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2177">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2177">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2178">La función  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2178">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2180">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2180">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2181">La función  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2181">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2202">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2202">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2203">11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2203">11 digits:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2209">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2209">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2210">La función  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2210">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2211">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2211">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2212">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2212">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2213">La función  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2213">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2244">Número de licencia de controladores de Chipre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2244">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2245">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial sólo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial del número de permiso de la UE driver.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2245">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2246">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2246">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2247">12 dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2247">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2248">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2248">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2249">12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2249">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2250">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2250">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2251">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2251">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2252">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2252">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2253">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2253">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2254">La expresión regular  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2254">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2255">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2255">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2290">Número de pasaporte de Chipre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2290">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2291">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de pasaporte de UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2291">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2292">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2292">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2293">Una letra seguida de 6-8 dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2293">One letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2294">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2294">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2295">Una letra seguida de seis a ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2295">One letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2296">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2296">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2297">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2297">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2298">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2298">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2299">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2299">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2300">La expresión regular  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2300">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2301">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2301">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2308">Número de identificación fiscal de Chipre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2308">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2309">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación de impuestos de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2309">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2310">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2310">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2311">Ocho dígitos y una letra en el patrón especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2311">Eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2312">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2312">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2313">Ocho dígitos y una letra:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2313">Eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2314">Un "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2314">A "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2315">Siete dígitos </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2315">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2316">Una letra (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2316">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2317">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2317">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2318">No aplicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2318">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2319">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2319">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2320">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2320">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2321">La función  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2321">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2322">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2322">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2323">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2323">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2324">La función  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2324">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2353">Número de permiso de conducción de Checo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2353">Czech driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2354">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial sólo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial del número de permiso de la UE driver.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2354">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2355">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2355">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2356">Dos letras seguidas de seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2356">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2357">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2357">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2358">Ocho letras y dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2358">Eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2359">Dos letras (sin distinción entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2359">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2360">Un espacio (opcional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2360">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2361">Seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2361">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2362">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2362">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2363">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2363">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2364">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2364">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2365">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2365">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2366">La expresión regular  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2366">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2367">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2367">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>

```

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2373">permiso de conducir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2373">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2377">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2377">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2378">número de permiso de conducción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2378">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2379">número de permiso de conducción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2379">driver's license number</span></span>
