## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2384">Número de pasaporte Checo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2384">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2385">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de pasaporte de UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2385">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2386">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2386">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2387">Ocho dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2387">Eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2388">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2388">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2389">Ocho dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2389">Eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2390">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2390">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2391">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2391">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2392">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2392">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2393">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2393">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2394">La expresión regular  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2394">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2395">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2395">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2403">Número de identidad personal en Checo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2403">Czech personal identity number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2404">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial se incluye en el paquete de números de identificación nacional de la UE y está disponible como entidad de tipo independiente de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2404">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National identification number bundle and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2405">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2405">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2406">Nueve dígitos con barra diagonal (formato antiguo) 10 dígitos con barra diagonal (nuevo formato) opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2406">Nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2407">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2407">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2408">Nueve dígitos (formato antiguo):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2408">Nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2409">Nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2409">Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2410">O</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2410">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2411">Seis dígitos que representan la fecha de nacimiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2411">Six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2412">Una barra diagonal </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2412">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2413">Tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2413">Three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2414">10 dígitos (nuevo formato):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2414">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2415">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2415">10 digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2416">O</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2416">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2417">Seis dígitos que representan la fecha de nacimiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2417">Six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2418">Una barra diagonal </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2418">A forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2419">Cuatro dígitos donde el último dígito es un dígito de control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2419">Four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2420">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2420">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2421">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2421">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2422">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2422">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2423">Una directiva DLP está 85% segura de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres: la función Func_czech_id_card encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2423">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2424">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_czech_id_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2424">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2425">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2425">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
<Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497"      patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
      <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2426">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2426">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2427">número de identidad personal en Checo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2427">czech personal identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2428">Rodné číslo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2428">Rodné číslo</span></span>



## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2429">Número de la seguridad social en Checo o identificación equivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2429">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2430">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el número de la seguridad social de la UE o el tipo de información confidencial del identificador equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2430">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2431">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2431">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2432">Diez dígitos y una barra diagonal inversa en el patrón especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2432">Ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2433">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2433">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2434">Diez dígitos y una barra diagonal inversa:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2434">Ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2435">Seis dígitos que corresponden a la fecha de nacimiento (AAMMDD):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2435">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2436">Una barra diagonal inversa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2436">A backslash</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2437">Tres dígitos que corresponden a un número de serie que separa a los empleados nacidos en la misma fecha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2437">Three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2438">Un dígito de control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2438">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2439">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2439">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2440">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2440">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2441">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2441">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2442">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2442">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2443">La función  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2443">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2444">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2444">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2445">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2445">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2446">La función  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2446">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2462">Número de identificación fiscal Checa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2462">Czech tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2463">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación de impuestos de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2463">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2464">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2464">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2465">Nueve o diez dígitos con una barra diagonal inversa opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2465">Nine or ten digits with an optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2466">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2466">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2467">Nueve o diez dígitos con una barra diagonal inversa opcional:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2467">Nine or ten digits with an optional backslashl:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2468">Seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2468">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2469">Una barra diagonal inversa (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2469">A backslash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2470">Tres o cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2470">Three or four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2471">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2471">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2472">No aplicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2472">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2473">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2473">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2474">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2474">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2475">La expresión regular  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2475">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2476">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2476">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2515">Número de permiso de conducción de Dinamarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2515">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2516">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial sólo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial del número de permiso de la UE driver.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2516">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2517">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2517">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2518">Ocho dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2518">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2519">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2519">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2520">Ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2520">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2521">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2521">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2522">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2522">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2523">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2523">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2524">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2524">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2525">La expresión regular  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2525">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2526">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2526">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2543">Número de pasaporte de Dinamarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2543">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2544">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de pasaporte de UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2544">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2545">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2545">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2546">Nueve dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2546">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2547">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2547">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2548">Nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2548">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2549">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2549">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2550">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2550">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2551">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2551">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2552">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2552">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2553">La expresión regular  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2553">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2554">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2554">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2555">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2555">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2556">**Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2556">**Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2557">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2557">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2558">número de pasaporte danés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2558">danish passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2559">n.º de pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2559">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2560">PAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2560">pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2561">pasnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2561">pasnummer</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2562">Número de identificación personal de Dinamarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2562">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2563">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial se incluye en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación nacional de la UE y está disponible como entidad de tipo independiente de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2563">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2564">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2564">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2565">10 dígitos que contienen un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2565">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2566">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2566">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2567">10 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2567">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2568">Seis dígitos en el formato DDMMAA que son la fecha de nacimiento </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2568">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2569">Un guión </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2569">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2570">4 dígitos en los que el último dígito es un dígito de control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2570">Four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2571">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2571">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2572">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2572">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2573">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2573">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2574">Una directiva DLP está 75% segura de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres: la expresión regular Regex_denmark_id encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2574">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The regular expression Regex_denmark_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2575">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_denmark_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2575">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2576">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2576">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
<Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2628">Número de la seguridad social de Dinamarca o identificación equivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2628">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2629">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible el número de la seguridad social de la UE o el tipo de información confidencial del identificador equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2629">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2630">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2630">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2631">Diez dígitos y un guión en el patrón especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2631">Ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2632">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2632">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2633">Diez dígitos y un guión:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2633">Ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2634">Seis dígitos que corresponden a la fecha de nacimiento (DDMMAA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2634">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2635">Un guión </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2635">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2636">Cuatro dígitos que corresponden a un número de secuencia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2636">Four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2637">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2637">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2638">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2638">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2639">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2639">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2640">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2640">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2641">La función  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2641">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2642">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2642">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2643">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2643">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2644">La función  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2644">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2645">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2645">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2658">Número de identificación fiscal de Dinamarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2658">Denmark tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2659">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación de impuestos de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2659">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2660">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2660">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2661">Diez dígitos que contienen un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2661">Ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2662">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2662">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2663">Diez dígitos que contienen un guión:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2663">Ten digits containing a hyphenl:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2664">Seis dígitos que corresponden a la fecha de nacimiento (DDMMAA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2664">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2665">Un guión </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2665">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2666">Cuatro dígitos que corresponden a un número de secuencia en el que el primer dígito corresponde al siglo de nacimiento y el último dígito corresponde al sexo de la persona (impar para macho e incluso para hembras)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2666">Four digits that correspond to a sequence number where the first digit corresponds to the century of birth and the last digit corresponds to the individual's gender (odd for male and even for female)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2667">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2667">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2668">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2668">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2669">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2669">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2670">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2670">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2671">La función  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2671">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2672">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2672">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2673">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2673">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2674">La función  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2674">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern> 
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2726">Número de la Agencia para la imposición de drogas (DEA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2726">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2727">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2727">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2728">Dos letras seguidas de siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2728">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2729">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2729">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2730">El patrón debe incluir todo lo siguiente:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2730">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2731">Una letra (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas) de este conjunto de letras posibles: abcdefghjklmnprstux, que es un código de inscrito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2731">One letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2732">Una letra (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas), que es la primera letra del apellido del inscrito.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2732">One letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2733">Siete dígitos, el último de los cuales es el dígito de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2733">Seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2734">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2734">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2735">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2735">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2736">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2736">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2737">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2737">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2738">La función Func_dea_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2738">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2739">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2739">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- DEA Number -->
<Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2740">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2740">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2741">Ninguno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2741">None</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2742">Número de permiso de conducción de Estonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2742">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2743">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial sólo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial del número de permiso de la UE driver.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2743">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2744">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2745">Dos letras seguidas de seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2745">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2746">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2747">Dos letras y seis dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2747">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2748">Las letras "ET" (sin distinción entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2748">The letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2749">Seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2749">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2750">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2750">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2751">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2751">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2752">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2752">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2753">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2753">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2754">La expresión regular  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2754">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2755">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2755">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
```

## <a name="estonia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2771">Estonia número de identificación nacional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2771">Estonia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2772">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación nacional de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2772">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2773">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2773">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2774">11 dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2774">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2775">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2775">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2776">11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2776">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2777">Un dígito que corresponde al sexo y al siglo de nacimiento (número impar macho, par hembra; 1-2: siglo XIX; 3-4: siglo XX; 5-6: siglo XXI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2777">One digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2778">Seis dígitos que corresponden a la fecha de nacimiento (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2778">Six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2779">Tres dígitos que corresponden a un número de serie que separa a los empleados nacidos en la misma fecha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2779">Three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2780">Un dígito de control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2780">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2781">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2781">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2782">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2782">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2783">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2783">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2784">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2784">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2785">La función  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2785">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2786">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2786">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2787">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2787">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2788">La función  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2788">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
</Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2821">Número de pasaporte de Estonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2821">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2825">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2825">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2826">Una letra seguida de siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2826">One letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2827">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2827">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2830">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2830">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2831">La expresión regular  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2831">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
        </Pattern>
```

## <a name="estonia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2839">Número de identificación de impuestos de Estonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2839">Estonia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2840">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación de impuestos de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2840">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2841">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2841">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2842">11 dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2842">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2843">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2843">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2844">11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2844">11 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2845">Un dígito que corresponde al sexo y al siglo de nacimiento donde un número impar indica macho y el número par indica hembra de la siguiente manera: 1,2 para el siglo XIX; 3, 4 para el siglo XX; y 5, 6 para el siglo XXI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2845">One digit that corresponds to gender and century of birth where an odd number indicates male and the even number indicates female as follows: 1, 2 for the 19th century; 3, 4 for the 20th century; and 5, 6 for the 21st century</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2846">Seis dígitos que corresponden a la fecha de nacimiento (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2846">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2847">Tres dígitos que corresponden a un número de serie que separa a los empleados nacidos en la misma fecha</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2847">Three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2848">Un dígito de control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2848">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2849">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2849">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2850">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2850">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2851">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2851">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2852">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2852">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2853">La función  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2853">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2854">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2854">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2855">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2855">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2856">La función  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2856">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2889">Número de tarjeta de débito de la UE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2889">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2890">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2890">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2891">16 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2891">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2892">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2892">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2893">Patrón muy complejo y robusto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2893">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2894">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2894">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2895">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2895">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2896">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2896">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2897">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2897">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2898">La función Func_eu_debit_card encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2898">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2899">Al menos una de las siguientes opciones es verdadera:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2899">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2900">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_eu_debit_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2900">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2901">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_card_terms_dict.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2901">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2902">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_card_security_terms_dict.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2902">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2903">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2903">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2904">La función Func_expiration_date encuentra una fecha en el formato de fecha correcto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2904">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-2905">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-2905">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3351">Número de permiso de conducción de Finlandia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3351">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3352">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial sólo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial del número de permiso de la UE driver.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3352">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3353">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3353">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3354">10 dígitos que contienen un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3354">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3355">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3355">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3356">10 dígitos que contienen un guión:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3356">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3357">Seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3357">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3358">Un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3358">A hyphen</span></span>
-  <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3359">Cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3359">Four digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3360">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3360">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3361">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3361">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3362">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3362">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3363">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3363">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3364">La expresión regular  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3364">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3365">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3365">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3381">Número de identificación nacional de Finlandia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3381">Finland national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3382">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial se incluye en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación nacional de la UE y está disponible como entidad de tipo independiente de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3382">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3383">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3383">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3384">Seis dígitos y un carácter que indican un siglo, más tres dígitos y un dígito de control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3384">Six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3385">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3385">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3386">El patrón debe incluir todo lo siguiente:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3386">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3387">Seis dígitos en el formato DDMMAA que son una fecha de nacimiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3387">Six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3388">Marcador del siglo (ya sea '-', '+' o 'a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3388">Century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3389">Número de identificación personal de tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3389">Three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3390">Un dígito o letra (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas) que es un dígito de control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3390">A digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3391">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3391">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3392">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3392">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3393">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3393">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3394">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3394">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3395">La función Func_finnish_national_id encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3395">The function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3396">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_finnish_national_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3396">A keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3397">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3397">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finnish National ID-->
<Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3446">Número de pasaporte de Finlandia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3446">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3447">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de la UE número de pasaporte y está disponible como entidad de tipo independiente de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3447">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3448">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3448">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3449">Combinación de nueve letras y dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3449">Combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3450">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3450">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3451">Combinación de nueve letras y dígitos: dos letras (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas), siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3451">Combination of nine letters and digits: Two letters (not case sensitive) Seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3452">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3452">Checksum</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3453">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3453">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3454">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3454">Definition</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3455">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3455">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3456">La expresión regular Regex_finland_passport_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3456">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3457">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_finland_passport_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3457">A keyword from Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3458">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3458">Keywords</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3459">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3459">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3462">Número de la seguridad social de Finlandia o identificación equivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3462">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3463">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el número de la seguridad social de la UE o el tipo de información confidencial del identificador equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3463">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3464">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3464">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3465">Una combinación de 11 caracteres en el formato especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3465">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3466">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3466">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3467">Una combinación de 11 caracteres en el formato especificado:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3467">An 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3468">Seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3468">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3469">Una instancia de una de las siguientes opciones:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3469">One instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3470">Símbolo más</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3470">Plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3471">Símbolo menos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3471">Minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3472">La letra "A" (sin distinción entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3472">The letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3473">Tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3473">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3474">Una letra o un dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3474">One letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3475">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3475">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3476">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3476">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3477">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3477">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3478">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3478">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3479">La función  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3479">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3480">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3480">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3481">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3481">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3482">La función  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3482">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3506">Número de identificación fiscal de Finlandia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3506">Finland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3507">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación de impuestos de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3507">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3508">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3509">Una combinación de 11 caracteres de dígitos, letras y más y un signo menos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3509">An 11-character combination of digits, letters, and plus and minus sign</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3510">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3510">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3511">Una combinación de 11 caracteres de dígitos, letras y más y un signo menos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3511">An 11-character combination of digits, letters, and plus and minus sign:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3512">Seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3512">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3513">Uno de los siguientes: un signo más, un signo menos o la letra "A" (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas) donde el signo más significa que nació entre 1800-1899, el signo menos significa que nació entre 1900-1999, y "A" significa que nació 2000 y posterior</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3513">One of the following: a plus sign, a minus sign, or the letter "A" (not case sensitive) where the plus sign means born between 1800-1899, the minus sign means born between 1900-1999, and "A" means born 2000 and after</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3514">Tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3514">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3515">Una letra o un número</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3515">One letter or one number</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3516">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3516">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3517">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3517">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3518">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3518">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3519">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3519">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3520">La función  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3520">The function  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3521">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3521">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3522">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3522">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-3523">La función  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-3523">The function  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
