## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4305">Número de identificación única (Aadhaar) de India</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4305">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4306">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4306">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4307">12 dígitos que contienen espacios o guiones opcionales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4307">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4308">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4308">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4309">12 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4309">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4310">Cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4310">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4311">Un guión o un espacio opcional </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4311">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4312">Cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4312">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4313">Un guión o un espacio opcional </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4313">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4314">El dígito final que es el dígito de control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4314">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4315">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4315">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4316">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4316">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4317">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4317">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4318">Una directiva DLP está 85% segura de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres: la función Func_india_aadhaar encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4318">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4319">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_india_aadhar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4319">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4320">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4320">The checksum passes.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4321">Una directiva DLP está 75% segura de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres: la función Func_india_aadhaar encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4321">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4322">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4322">The checksum passes.</span></span>
```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4329">Número de tarjeta de identidad (KTP) de Indonesia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4329">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4330">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4330">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4331">16 dígitos que contienen puntos opcionales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4331">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4332">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4332">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4333">16 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4333">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4334">Código de la provincia de dos dígitos </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4334">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4335">Un punto (opcional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4335">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4336">Código de ciudad o regencia de dos dígitos </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4336">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4337">Código de subdistrito de dos dígitos </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4337">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4338">Un punto (opcional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4338">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4339">Seis dígitos en el formato DDMMAA que son la fecha de nacimiento </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4339">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4340">Un punto (opcional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4340">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4341">Cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4341">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4342">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4342">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4343">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4343">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4344">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4344">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4345">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4345">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4346">La expresión regular Regex_indonesia_id_card encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4346">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4347">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_indonesia_id_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4347">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4353">Número de cuenta bancaria internacional (IBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4353">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4354">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4354">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4355">Código de país (dos letras) más dígitos de control (dos dígitos), más el número IBAN (hasta 30 caracteres)
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4355">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4356">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4356">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4357">El patrón debe incluir todo lo siguiente:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4357">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4358">Código de país de dos letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4358">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4359">Dos dígitos de control (seguidos de un espacio opcional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4359">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4360">1-7 grupos de cuatro letras o dígitos (pueden estar separados por espacios)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4360">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4361">1-3 letras o dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4361">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-p136">El formato de cada país es ligeramente diferente. El tipo de información confidencial del IBAN cubre estos 60 países:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-p136">The format for each country is slightly different. The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4364">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4364">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4365">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4365">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4366">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4366">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4367">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4367">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4368">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4368">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4369">La función Func_iban encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4369">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4370">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4370">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4373">Clasificación Internacional de enfermedades (ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4373">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4374">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4374">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4375">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4375">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4376">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4376">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4377">Palabra clave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4377">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4378">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4378">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4379">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4379">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4380">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4380">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4381">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4381">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4382">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Dictionary_icd_10_updated.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4382">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4383">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Dictionary_icd_10_codes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4383">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4384">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4384">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4385">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Dictionary_icd_10_ Updated.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4385">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4386">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4386">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4387">Cualquier término del Diccionario de palabras clave Dictionary_icd_10_updated, que se basa en la [clasificación internacional de enfermedades, décima revisión, modificación clínica (ICD-10-cm)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4387">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4388">Este tipo solo busca el término, no los códigos de seguro.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4388">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4389">Cualquier término del Diccionario de palabras clave Dictionary_icd_10_codes, que se basa en la [clasificación internacional de enfermedades, décima revisión, modificación clínica (ICD-10-cm)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4389">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4390">Este tipo busca sólo los códigos de seguros, no la descripción.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4390">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4392">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4392">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4393">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4393">Dictionary</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4395">Palabra clave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4395">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4396">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4397">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4397">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4398">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4399">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4399">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4400">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Dictionary_icd_9_updated.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4400">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4401">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Dictionary_icd_9_codes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4401">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4402">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4402">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4403">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Dictionary_icd_9_updated.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4403">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4409">Dirección IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4409">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4410">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4410">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4411">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4411">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4412">Patrón complejo que representa las versiones con formato (con puntos) y sin formato (sin puntos) de las direcciones IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4412">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4413">Protocolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4413">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4414"> Patrón complejo que representa el formato de números IPv6 (que incluye signos de dos puntos)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4414">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4415">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4415">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4416">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4416">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4417">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4417">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4418">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4418">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4419">Para IPv6, una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4419">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4420">La expresión regular Regex_ipv6_address encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4420">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4421">No se encuentra ninguna palabra clave de Keyword_ipaddress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4421">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4422">Para IPv4, una directiva DLP está segura al 95% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4422">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4423">La expresión regular Regex_ipv4_address encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4423">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4424">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_ipaddress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4424">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4425">Para IPv6, una directiva DLP está segura al 95% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4425">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4426">La expresión regular Regex_ipv6_address encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4426">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4427">No se encuentra ninguna palabra clave de Keyword_ipaddress.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4427">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4435">Número de permiso de conducción de Irlanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4435">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4436">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial sólo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial del número de permiso de la UE driver.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4436">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4439">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4439">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4440">Seis dígitos y cuatro letras:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4440">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4444">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4444">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4445">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4446">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4446">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4447">La expresión regular  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4447">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />

        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4464">Número de identificación nacional de Irlanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4464">Ireland national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4465">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo se incluye en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación nacional de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4465">This sensitive information type entity is only included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4466">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4466">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4467">Una combinación de Letras de nueve caracteres, dígitos y un espacio en el patrón especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4467">A nine-character combination of letters, digits, and a space in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4468">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4468">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4469">Una combinación de Letras de nueve caracteres, dígitos y un espacio en el patrón especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4469">A nine-character combination of letters, digits, and a space in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4470">De 01 de enero de 2013 a ahora:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4470">From 01 January 2013 to now:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4471">Siete dígitos </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4471">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4472">Un dígito de control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4472">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4473">Un espacio o la letra mayúscula "W" (distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4473">One space or the uppercase letter "W" (Case sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4474">Antes del 01 de enero de 2013:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4474">Prior to 01 January 2013:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4475">Siete dígitos </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4475">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4476">Un dígito de control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4476">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4477">Un espacio o una letra mayúscula (distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4477">One space or an uppercase letter (Case sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4478">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4478">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4479">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4479">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4480">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4480">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4481">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4481">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4482">La función busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4482">The function finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4483">Se encuentra una palabra clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4483">A keyword from is found.</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4484">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4484">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4485">La función busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4485">The function finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!--Ireland national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4514">Número de pasaporte de Irlanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4514">Ireland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4515">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de pasaporte de UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4515">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4516">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4516">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4517">Dos letras o dígitos seguidos de siete dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4517">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4518">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4518">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4519">Dos letras o dígitos seguidos de siete dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4519">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4520">Dos dígitos o letras (no distinguen entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4520">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4521">Siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4521">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4522">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4523">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4523">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4524">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4525">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4525">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4526">La expresión regular  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4526">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4527">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4527">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4528">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4528">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4529">**Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4529">**Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4530">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4530">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4531">número de pasaporte irlandés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4531">irish passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4532">n.º de pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4532">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4533">PAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4533">pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4534">usuarios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4534">passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4535">passeport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4535">passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4536">passeport numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4536">passeport numero</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4537">Número de servicio público personal (PPS) de Irlanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4537">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4538">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4539">Formato antiguo (hasta el 31 de diciembre de 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4539">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4540">Siete dígitos seguidos por 1 o 2 letras </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4540">Seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4541">Nuevo formato (1 de enero de 2013 y posterior):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4541">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4542">Siete dígitos seguidos por dos letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4542">Seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4543">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4543">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4544">Formato antiguo (hasta el 31 de diciembre de 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4544">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4545">Siete dígitos </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4545">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4546">1 o 2 letras (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4546">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4547">Nuevo formato (1 de enero de 2013 y posterior):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4547">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4548">Siete dígitos </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4548">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4549">Una letra (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas) que es un dígito de control alfabético </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4549">A letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4550">La letra "A" o "H" (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4550">The letter "A" or "H" (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4551">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4551">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4552">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4552">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4553">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4553">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4554">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4554">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4555">La función Func_ireland_pps encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4555">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4556">Una de las siguientes opciones es verdadera:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4556">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4557">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_ireland_pps.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4557">A keyword from Keyword_ireland_pps is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4558">La función Func_eu_date encuentra una fecha en el formato de fecha correcto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4558">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4559">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4559">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4560">Una directiva DLP está segura al 65% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4560">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4561">La función Func_ireland_pps encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4561">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4562">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4562">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
<Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps"/>
     <Any minMatches="1">
  <Match idRef="Keyword_ireland_pps"/>
  <Match idRef="Func_eu_date"/>
     </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_ireland_pps"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4564">Keyword_ireland_pps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4564">Keyword_ireland_pps</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4567">PPS Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4568">N.º PPS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4568">PPS No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4569">N.ro PPS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4569">PPS #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4570">PPS #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4570">PPS#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4571">PPSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4571">PPSN</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4577">Número de identificación fiscal de Irlanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4577">Ireland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4578">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación de impuestos de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4578">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4579">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4579">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4580">Siete dígitos seguidos de una letra sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4580">Seven digits followed by a letter with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4581">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4581">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4582">Siete dígitos seguidos de una letra:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4582">Seven digits followed by a letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4583">Siete dígitos </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4583">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4584">Una letra (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4584">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4585">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4585">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4586">No aplicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4586">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4587">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4587">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4588">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4588">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4589">La función  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4589">The function  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4590">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4590">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4591">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4591">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4592">La función  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4592">The function  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4593">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4593">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4594">Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4594">Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4595">servicio de identidad de cliente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4595">client identity service</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4596">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4597">número de identificación personal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4597">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4598">número de servicio público personal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4598">personal public service number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4599">n.º de servicio personal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4599">personal service no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4600">phearsanta seirbhíse poiblí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4600">phearsanta seirbhíse poiblí</span></span>

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4621">Número de cuenta bancaria de Israel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4621">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4622">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4622">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4623">13 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4623">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4624">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4624">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4625">Con formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4625">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4626">Dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4626">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4627">Guion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4627">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4628">Tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4628">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4629">Guion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4629">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4630">Ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4630">Eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4631">Sin formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4631">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4632">	13 dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4632">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4633">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4633">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4634">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4634">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4635">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4635">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4636">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4636">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4637">La expresión regular Regex_israel_bank_account_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4637">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4638">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_israel_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4638">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4639">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4639">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4640">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4640">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4641">Número de cuenta bancaria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4641">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4642">Cuenta bancaria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4642">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4643">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4643">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4644">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4644">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4645">Número de identificación nacional de Israel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4645">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4646">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4646">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4647">Nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4647">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4648">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4648">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4649">Nueve dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4649">Nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4650">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4650">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4651">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4651">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4652">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4652">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4653">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4653">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4654">La función Func_israeli_national_id_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4654">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4655">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_Israel_National_ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4655">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4656">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4656">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4657">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4657">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4658">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4658">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4659">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4659">מספר זהות</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4660">National ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4660">National ID Number</span></span>
   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4661">Número de permiso de conducción de Italia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4661">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4662">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial se incluye en el tipo de información confidencial del número de licencia de conductor de la UE y está disponible como entidad de tipo independiente de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4662">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4663">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4663">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4664">Una combinación de 10 letras y dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4664">A combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4665">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4665">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4666">Una combinación de 10 letras y dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4666">A combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4667">Una letra (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4667">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4668">La letra "A" o "V" (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4668">The letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4669">Siete letras (no distinguen entre mayúsculas y minúsculas), dígitos o caracteres de subrayado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4669">Seven letters (not case sensitive), digits, or the underscore character</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4670">Una letra (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4670">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4671">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4671">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4672">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4672">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4673">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4673">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4674">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4674">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4675">La expresión regular Regex_italy_drivers_license_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4675">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4676">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4676">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4677">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4677">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4678">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4678">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4679">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4679">numero di patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4680">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4680">patente di guida</span></span> 

## <a name="italy-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4681">Número de identificación nacional de Italia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4681">Italy national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4682">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación nacional de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4682">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4683">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4684">Una combinación de letras y dígitos de 16 caracteres en el patrón especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4684">A 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4685">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4686">Una combinación de letras y dígitos de 16 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4686">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4687">Tres letras que corresponden a las tres primeras consonantes en el nombre de la familia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4687">Three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4688">Tres letras que corresponden a los consonantes primero, tercero y cuarto en el nombre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4688">Three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4689">Dos dígitos que corresponden a los últimos dígitos del año de nacimiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4689">Two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4690">Una letra que corresponde a la carta del mes de nacimiento: las letras se usan en orden alfabético, pero solo se usan las letras de a a E, H, L, M, P, R a T (por lo tanto, enero es A y octubre es R)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4690">One letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4691">Dos dígitos que corresponden al día del mes de nacimiento: para diferenciar entre los sexos, 40 se agrega al día de nacimiento para las mujeres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4691">Two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4692">Cuatro dígitos que corresponden al código de área específico del municipio donde nació la persona (los códigos de todo el país se usan para países extranjeros)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4692">Four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4693">Un dígito de paridad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4693">One parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4694">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4694">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4695">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4695">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4696">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4696">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4697">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4697">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4698">La función  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4698">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4699">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4699">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4700">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4700">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4701">La función  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4701">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Italy national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />

<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">

</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4736">Número de pasaporte de Italia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4736">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4737">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de pasaporte de UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4737">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4738">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4738">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4739">Dos letras o dígitos seguidos de siete dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4739">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4740">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4740">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4741">Dos letras o dígitos seguidos de siete dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4741">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4742">Dos dígitos o letras (no distinguen entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4742">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4743">Siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4743">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4744">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4744">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4745">No aplicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4745">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4746">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4746">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4747">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4747">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4748">La expresión regular  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4748">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4749">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4749">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4761">Número de identificación fiscal de Italia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4761">Italy tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4762">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación de impuestos de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4762">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4763">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4763">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4764">16 letras y dígitos en el patrón especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4764">16 letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4765">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4765">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4766">16 letras y dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4766">16 letters and digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4767">Tres letras que corresponden a las tres primeras consonantes en el nombre de la familia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4767">Three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4768">Tres letras que corresponden a los consonantes primero, tercero y cuarto en el nombre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4768">Three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4769">Dos dígitos que corresponden a los últimos dígitos del año de nacimiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4769">Two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4770">Un dígito que corresponde al mes de nacimiento: las letras se usan en orden alfabético, pero solo se usan las letras de a a E, H, L, M, P, R a T (por lo tanto, enero es A y octubre es R)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4770">One digit that corresponds to the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4771">Dos dígitos que corresponden al día del mes de nacimiento donde se agrega 40 al día de nacimiento para hembras para diferenciar de machos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4771">Two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth where 40 is added to the day of birth for females to differentiate from males</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4772">Cuatro dígitos que corresponden a un código de área específico del municipio donde nació la persona (los códigos de todo el país se usan para países extranjeros).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4772">Four digits that correspond to an area code specific to the municipality where the person was born—country-wide codes are used for foreign countries</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4773">Un dígito de control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4773">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4774">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4774">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4775">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4775">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4776">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4776">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4777">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4777">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4778">La función  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4778">The function  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4779">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4779">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4780">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4780">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4781">La función  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4781">The function  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
