## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4816">Número de cuenta bancaria de Japón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4816">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4817">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4817">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4818">Siete u ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4818">Seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4819">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4819">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4820">Número de cuenta bancaria:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4820">Bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4821">Siete u ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4821">Seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4822">Código de sucursal del banco:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4822">Bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4823">Cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4823">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4824">Un espacio o un guion (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4824">A space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4825">Tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4825">Three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4826">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4826">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4827">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4827">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4828">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4828">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4829">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4829">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4830">La función Func_jp_bank_account encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4830">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4831">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_jp_bank_account.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4831">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4832">Una de las siguientes opciones es verdadera:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4832">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4833">La función Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4833">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4834">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4834">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4835">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4835">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4836">La función Func_jp_bank_account encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4836">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4837">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_jp_bank_account.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4837">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4896">Número de permiso de conducción de Japón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4896">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4897">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4897">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4898">12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4898">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4899">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4899">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4900">12 dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4900">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4901">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4901">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4902">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4902">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4903">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4903">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4904">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4904">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4905">La función Func_jp_drivers_license_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4905">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4906">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4906">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4934">Número de pasaporte de Japón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4934">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4935">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4935">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4936">Dos letras seguidas de siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4936">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4937">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4937">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4938">Dos letras (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas) seguidas por siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4938">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4939">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4939">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4940">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4940">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4941">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4941">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4942">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4942">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4943">La función Func_jp_passport encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4943">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4944">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_jp_passport.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4944">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4951">Número de tarjeta de residencia de Japón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4951">Japan residence card number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4955">12 letras y dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4955">12 letters and digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4957">Ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4957">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4959">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4959">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4962">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4962">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4963">La expresión regular Regex_jp_residence_card_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4963">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4964">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_jp_residence_card_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4964">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4995">Número del seguro social de Japón (SIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4995">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4996">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4996">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4997">De 7 a 12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4997">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4998">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4998">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-4999">7-12 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-4999">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5000">Cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5000">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5001">Un guion (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5001">A hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5002">Seis dígitos o</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5002">Six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5003">De 7 a 12 dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5003">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5004">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5004">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5005">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5005">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5006">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5006">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5007">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5007">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5008">La función Func_jp_sin encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5008">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5009">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_jp_sin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5009">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5010">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5010">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5011">La función Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5011">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5012">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_jp_sin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5012">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5016">Social Insurance Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5016">Social Insurance Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5017">Social Insurance Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5017">Social Insurance Number</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5020">Número de permiso de conducción de Letonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5020">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5021">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial sólo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial del número de permiso de la UE driver.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5021">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5023">Tres letras seguidas de seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5023">Three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5024">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5024">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5025">Tres letras y seis dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5025">Three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5026">Tres letras (sin distinción entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5026">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5027">Seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5027">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5028">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5028">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5029">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5029">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5030">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5030">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5031">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5031">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5032">La expresión regular  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5032">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5033">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5033">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5049">Número de identificación nacional de Letonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5049">Latvia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5050">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación nacional de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5050">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5051">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5051">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5052">11 dígitos y un guión en el formato especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5052">11 digits and a hyphen in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5053">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5053">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5054">11 dígitos y un guión:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5054">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5055">Seis dígitos que corresponden a la fecha de nacimiento (DDMMAA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5055">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5056">Un guión </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5056">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5057">Un dígito que corresponde al siglo de nacimiento ("0" para el siglo XIX, "1" para el siglo XX y "2" para el siglo XXI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5057">One digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5058">Cuatro dígitos, generados aleatoriamente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5058">Four digits, randomly generated</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5059">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5059">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5060">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5060">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5061">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5061">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5062">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5062">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5063">La función  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5063">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5064">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5064">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5065">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5065">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5066">La función  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5066">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Latvia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5129">Número de pasaporte de Letonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5129">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5130">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de pasaporte de UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5130">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5131">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5131">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5132">Dos letras o dígitos seguidos de siete dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5132">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5133">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5133">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5134">Dos letras o dígitos seguidos de siete dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5134">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5135">Dos dígitos o letras (no distinguen entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5135">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5136">Siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5136">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5137">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5137">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5138">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5138">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5139">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5139">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5140">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5140">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5141">La expresión regular  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5141">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5142">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5142">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5149">Número de identificación fiscal de Letonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5149">Latvia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5150">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación de impuestos de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5150">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5151">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5151">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5152">11 dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5152">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5153">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5153">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5154">11 dígitos en el patrón especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5154">11 digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5155">Seis dígitos que corresponden a la fecha de nacimiento (DDMMAA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5155">Six digits that correspond to the date of birth (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5156">Un dígito que corresponde al siglo de nacimiento en el que "0" corresponde al siglo XIX, "1" corresponde al siglo XX y "2" corresponde al siglo XXI.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5156">One digit that corresponds to the century of birth where "0" corresponds to 19th century, "1" corresponds to 20th century, and "2"corresponds to 21st century</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5157">Cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5157">Four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5158">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5158">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5159">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5159">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5160">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5160">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5161">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5161">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5162">La función  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5162">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5163">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5163">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5164">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5164">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5165">La función  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5165">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5228">Número de permiso de conducción de Lituania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5228">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5229">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial sólo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial del número de permiso de la UE driver.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5229">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5230">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5230">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5231">Ocho dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5231">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5232">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5232">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5233">Ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5233">Eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5234">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5234">Checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5236">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5236">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5237">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5237">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5239">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5239">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5255">Número de identificación nacional de Lituania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5255">Lithuania national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5256">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación nacional de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5256">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5257">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5257">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5258">11 dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5258">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5259">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5259">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5260">11 dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5260">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5261">Un dígito que corresponde al sexo de la persona y al siglo de nacimiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5261">One digit that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5262">Seis dígitos que corresponden a la fecha de nacimiento (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5262">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5263">Tres dígitos que corresponden al número de serie de la fecha de nacimiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5263">Three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5264">Un dígito de control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5264">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5265">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5265">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5266">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5266">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5267">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5267">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5268">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5268">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5269">La función  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5269">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5270">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5270">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5271">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5271">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5272">La función  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5272">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Lithuania national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern> 
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5307">Número de pasaporte de Lituania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5307">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5308">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de pasaporte de UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5308">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5309">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5309">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5310">Ocho dígitos o letras sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5310">Eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5311">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5311">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5312">Ocho dígitos o letras (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5312">Eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5313">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5313">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5314">No aplicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5314">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5315">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5315">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5316">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5316">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5317">La expresión regular  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5317">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5318">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5318">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5319">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5319">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5320">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5320">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5322">Número de identificación del impuesto de Lituania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5322">Lithuania tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5323">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación de impuestos de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5323">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5324">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5324">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5325">11 dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5325">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5326">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5326">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5327">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5327">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5328">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5328">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5329">No aplicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5329">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5330">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5330">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5331">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5331">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5332">La función  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5332">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5333">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5333">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5334">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5334">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5335">La función  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5335">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5341">identificador mokesčių</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5341">mokesčių id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5342">mokesčių identifikavimas número</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5342">mokesčių identifikavimas numeris</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5369">Número de permiso de conducción de Luxemburgo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5369">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5370">la entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial del número de licencia de la UE driver.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5370">his sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5371">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5371">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5372">Seis dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5372">Six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5373">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5373">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5374">Seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5374">Six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5375">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5375">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5376">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5376">No</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5378">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5378">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5379">La expresión regular  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5379">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5380">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5380">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->

        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5396">Número de identificación nacional de Luxemburgo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5396">Luxemburg national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5397">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación nacional de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5397">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5398">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5398">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5399">11 dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5399">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5400">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5400">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5401">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5401">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5402">Un dígito que corresponde al sexo de la persona y al siglo de nacimiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5402">One digit that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5403">Seis dígitos que corresponden a la fecha de nacimiento (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5403">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5404">Tres dígitos que corresponden al número de serie de la fecha de nacimiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5404">Three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5405">Un dígito de control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5405">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5406">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5406">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5407">No aplicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5407">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5408">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5408">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5409">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5409">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5410">La expresión regular  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5410">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5411">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5411">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5452">13 dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5452">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5453">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5453">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5454">13 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5454">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5455">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5455">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5456">Dos dígitos de control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5456">Two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5457">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5457">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5458">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5458">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5459">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5459">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5460">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5460">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5461">La función  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5461">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5462">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5462">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5463">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5463">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5464">La función  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5464">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5504">Número de tarjeta de identificación de Malasia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5504">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5505">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5505">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5506">12 dígitos que contienen guiones opcionales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5506">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5507">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5507">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5508">12 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5508">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5509">Seis dígitos en el formato DDMMAA que son la fecha de nacimiento </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5509">Six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5510">Un guión (opcional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5510">A dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5511">Código de dos letras del lugar de nacimiento </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5511">Two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5512">Un guión (opcional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5512">A dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5513">Tres dígitos aleatorios </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5513">Three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5514">Código de género de un dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5514">One-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5515">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5515">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5516">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5516">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5517">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5517">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5518">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5518">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5519">La expresión regular Regex_malaysia_id_card_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5519">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5520">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5520">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5547">Número de permiso de conducción de Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5547">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5548">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial sólo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial del número de permiso de la UE driver.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5548">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5549">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5549">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5550">Combinación de dos caracteres y seis dígitos en el patrón especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5550">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5551">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5551">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5552">Combinación de dos caracteres y seis dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5552">Combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5553">Dos caracteres (dígitos o letras, no distinguen entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5553">Two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5554">Un espacio (opcional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5554">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5555">Tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5555">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5556">Un espacio (opcional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5556">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5557">Tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5557">Three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5558">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5558">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5559">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5559">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5560">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5560">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5561">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5561">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5562">La expresión regular  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5562">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5563">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5563">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
 <Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5579">Número de identificación nacional de Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5579">Malta national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5580">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación nacional de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5580">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5581">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5581">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5582">Siete dígitos seguidos de una letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5582">Seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5583">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5583">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5584">Siete dígitos seguidos de una letra:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5584">Seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5585">Siete dígitos </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5585">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5586">Una letra mayúscula (distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5586">One uppercase letter (case sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5587">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5587">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5588">No aplicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5588">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5589">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5589">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5590">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5590">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5591">La expresión regular  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5591">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5592">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5592">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5593">Una directiva DLP está segura al 65% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5593">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5594">La expresión regular  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5594">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Malta national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5611">Número de pasaporte de Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5611">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5612">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de pasaporte de UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5612">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5613">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5613">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5614">Siete dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5614">Seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5615">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5615">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5616">Siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5616">Seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5617">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5617">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5618">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5618">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5619">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5619">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5620">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5620">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5621">La expresión regular  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5621">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5622">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5622">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5629">Número de identificación fiscal de Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5629">Malta tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5630">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación de impuestos de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5630">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5631">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5631">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5632">Para los nacionales de Maltés: 7 dígitos y una letra en el patrón especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5632">For Maltese nationals: 7 digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5633">Nacionales no Maltés y entidades de Maltés: 9 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5633">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: 9 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5634">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5634">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5635">Nacionales de Malta: 7 dígitos y una letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5635">Maltese nationals: 7 digits and one letter</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5636">Siete dígitos </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5636">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5637">Una letra (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5637">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5638">Nacionales no Maltés y entidades de Maltés: 9 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5638">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: 9 digits</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5639">Nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5639">Nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5640">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5640">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5641">No aplicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5641">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5642">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5642">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5643">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5643">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5644">La función  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5644">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5645">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5645">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5646">Una directiva DLP está segura al 65% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5646">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5647">La función  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5647">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5661">tax id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5663">número de identificación fiscal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5663">tax identification number</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5680">Número de servicio del ciudadano (BSN) de Holanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5680">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5681">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5681">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5682">8 o 9 dígitos que contienen espacios opcionales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5682">8-9 digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5683">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5683">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5684">8 o 9 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5684">8-9 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5685">Tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5685">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5686">Un espacio (opcional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5686">A space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5687">Tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5687">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5688">Un espacio (opcional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5688">A space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5689">2 o 3 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5689">2-3 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5690">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5690">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5691">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5691">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5692">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5692">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5693">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5693">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5694">La función Func_netherlands_bsn encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5694">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5695">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_netherlands_bsn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5695">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5696">La función Func_eu_date2 encuentra una fecha en el formato de fecha correcto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5696">The function Func_eu_date2 finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5697">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5697">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
<Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Keyword_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Func_eu_date2" /> 
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
