## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5721">Número de permiso de conducción de los países bajos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5721">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5722">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial sólo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial del número de permiso de la UE driver.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5722">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5723">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5723">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5724">10 dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5724">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5725">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5725">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5726">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5726">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5727">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5727">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5728">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5728">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5729">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5729">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5730">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5730">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5731">La expresión regular  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5731">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5732">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5732">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5750">Número de identificación nacional de países bajos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5750">Netherlands national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5751">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación nacional de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5751">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5752">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5752">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5753">Nueve dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5753">Nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5754">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5754">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5755">Nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5755">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5756">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5756">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5757">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5757">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5758">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5758">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5759">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5759">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5760">La función  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5760">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5761">Se encuentra una palabra clave de.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5761">A keyword from is found.</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5762">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5762">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5763">La función  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5763">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Netherland national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5787">Número de pasaporte de Holanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5787">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5788">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de pasaporte de UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5788">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5789">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5789">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5790">Nueve letras o dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5790">Nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5791">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5791">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5792">Nueve letras o dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5792">Nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5793">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5793">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5794">No aplicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5794">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5795">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5795">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5796">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5796">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5797">La expresión regular  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5797">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5798">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5798">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5799">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5799">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5800">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5800">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5801">número de pasaporte holandés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5801">dutch passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5802">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5802">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5803">número de pasaporte de Holanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5803">netherlands passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5804">nederlanden paspoort nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5804">nederlanden paspoort nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5805">paspoort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5805">paspoort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5806">nederlanden paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5806">nederlanden paspoortnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5807">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5807">paspoortnummer</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5808">Número de identificación fiscal de países bajos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5808">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5809">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación de impuestos de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5809">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5810">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5810">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5811">Nueve dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5811">Nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5812">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5812">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5813">Nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5813">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5814">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5814">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5815">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5815">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5816">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5816">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5817">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5817">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5818">La función  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5818">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5819">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5819">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5820">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5820">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5821">La función  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5821">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5859">Número de Ministerio de salud de Nueva Zelanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5859">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5860">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5860">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5861">Tres letras, un espacio (opcional) y cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5861">Three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5862">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5862">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5863">Tres letras (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas), un espacio (opcional) y cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5863">Three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5864">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5864">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5865">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5865">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5866">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5866">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5867">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5867">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5868">La función Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5868">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5869">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_nz_terms.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5869">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5870">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5870">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5871">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5871">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5872">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5872">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5873">NHI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5873">NHI</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5874">New Zealand</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5874">New Zealand</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5875">Salud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5875">Health</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5876">régimen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5876">treatment</span></span> 
   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5877">Número de identificación de Noruega</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5877">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5878">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5878">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5879">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5879">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5880">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5880">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5881">11 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5881">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5882">Seis dígitos en el formato DDMMAA que son la fecha de nacimiento </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5882">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5883">Número individual de tres dígitos </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5883">Three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5884">Dos dígitos de control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5884">Two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5885">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5885">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5886">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5886">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5887">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5887">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5888">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5888">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5889">La función Func_norway_id_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5889">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5890">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_norway_id_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5890">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5891">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5891">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5892">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5892">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5893">La función Func_norway_id_numbe encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5893">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5894">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5894">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5903">Número de identificación multiuso Unificado de Filipinas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5903">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5904">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5904">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5905">12 dígitos separados por guiones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5905">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5906">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5906">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5907">12 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5907">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5908">Cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5908">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5909">Un guión </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5909">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5910">Siete dígitos </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5910">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5911">Un guión </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5911">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5912">Un dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5912">One digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5913">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5913">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5914">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5914">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5915">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5915">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5916">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5916">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5917">La expresión regular Regex_philippines_unified_id encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5917">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5918">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_philippines_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5918">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5919">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5919">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5920">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5920">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5921">Id. universal unificado
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5921">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5925">Número de permiso de conducción de Polonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5925">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5926">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial sólo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial del número de permiso de la UE driver.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5926">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5927">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5927">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5928">14 dígitos que contienen 2 barras diagonales</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5928">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5929">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5929">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5930">14 dígitos y 2 barras diagonales:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5930">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5931">Cinco dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5931">Five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5932">Una barra diagonal </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5932">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5933">Dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5933">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5934">Una barra diagonal </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5934">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5935">Siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5935">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5936">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5936">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5937">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5937">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5938">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5938">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5939">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5939">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5940">La expresión regular  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5940">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5941">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5941">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5957">Tarjeta de identidad de Polonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5957">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5958">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5958">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5959">Tres letras y seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5959">Three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5960">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5960">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5961">Tres letras (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas) seguidas por seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5961">Three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5962">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5962">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5963">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5963">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5964">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5964">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5965">Una directiva DLP está 75% segura de que se detecta este tipo de información confidencial si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres: la función Func_polish_national_id encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5965">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5966">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5966">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5967">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5967">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5968">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5968">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5969">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5969">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5972">Nazwa i número dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5972">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5973">Nazwa i NR dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5973">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5974">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5974">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5975">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5975">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5976">Dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5976">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5977">MacOS.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5977">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5978">Identificación nacional de Polonia (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5978">Poland National ID (PESEL)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5979">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial se incluye en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación nacional de la UE y está disponible como entidad de tipo independiente de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5979">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5980">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5980">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5981">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5981">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5982">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5982">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5983">11 dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5983">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5984">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5984">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5985">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5985">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5986">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5986">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5987">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5987">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5988">La función Func_pesel_identification_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5988">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5989">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_pesel_identification_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5989">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-5990">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-5990">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->      
<Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6002">Número de pasaporte de Polonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6002">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6003">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial se incluye en el tipo de información confidencial de la UE número de pasaporte y está disponible como entidad de tipo independiente de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6003">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6004">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6004">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6005">Dos letras y siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6005">Two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6006">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6006">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6007">Dos letras (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas) seguidas por siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6007">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6008">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6008">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6009">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6009">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6010">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6010">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6011">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6011">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6012">La función Func_polish_passport_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6012">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6013">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6013">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6014">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6014">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6015">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6015">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6021">Número de identificación fiscal de Polonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6021">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6022">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación de impuestos de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6022">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6023">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6023">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6024">Once dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6024">Eleven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6025">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6025">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6026">Once dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6026">Eleven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6027">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6027">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6028">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6028">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6029">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6029">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6030">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6030">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6031">La función  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6031">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6032">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6032">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6033">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6033">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6034">La función  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6034">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6064">Número de tarjeta de ciudadano de Portugal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6064">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6065">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial se incluye en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación nacional de la UE y está disponible como entidad de tipo independiente de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6065">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6066">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial se incluye en el número de la seguridad social de la UE o en el tipo de información confidencial del identificador equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6066">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6067">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6067">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6068">Ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6068">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6069">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6069">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6070">Ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6070">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6071">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6071">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6072">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6072">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6073">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6073">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6074">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6074">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6075">La expresión regular Regex_portugal_citizen_card encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6075">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6076">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_portugal_citizen_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6076">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6096">Número de permiso de conducción de Portugal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6096">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6097">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial sólo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial del número de permiso de la UE driver.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6097">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6098">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6098">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6099">Dos letras seguidas de siete números en el patrón especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6099">Two letters followed by a seven numbers in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6100">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6100">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6101">Dos letras seguidas de siete números con caracteres especiales:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6101">Two letters followed by seven numbers with special characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6102">Dos letras (sin distinción entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6102">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6103">Un guión </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6103">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6104">Seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6104">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6105">Un espacio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6105">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6106">Un dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6106">One digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6107">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6107">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6108">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6108">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6109">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6109">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6110">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6110">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6111">La expresión regular  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6111">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6112">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6112">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6153">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6153">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6154">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6154">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6157">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6157">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6158">La función  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6158">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />

        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">

        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6187">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6187">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6303">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6303">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6304">La expresión regular  `Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6304">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6356">Identificación nacional de Arabia Saudí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6356">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6357">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6357">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6358">10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6358">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6359">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6359">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6360">10 dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6360">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6361">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6361">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6362">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6362">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6363">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6363">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6364">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6364">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6365">La expresión regular Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6365">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6366">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6366">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6369">Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6369">Identification Card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6371">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6371">ID number</span></span>

## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6373">Número de tarjeta de identidad de registro nacional (NRIC) de Singapur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6373">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6374">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6374">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6375">Nueve letras y dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6375">Nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6376">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6376">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6377">Nueve letras y dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6377">Nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6378">La letra "F", "G", "S", o "T" (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6378">The letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6379">Siete dígitos </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6379">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6380">Un dígito de control alfabético</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6380">An alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6381">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6381">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6382">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6382">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6383">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6383">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6384">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6384">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6385">La expresión regular Regex_singapore_nric encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6385">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6386">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_singapore_nric.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6386">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6387">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6387">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6388">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6388">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6389">La expresión regular Regex_singapore_nric encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6389">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6390">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6390">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6391">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6391">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6401">Número de permiso de conducción de Eslovaquia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6401">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6402">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial sólo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial del número de permiso de la UE driver.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6402">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6403">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6403">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6404">Un carácter seguido de siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6404">One character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6405">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6405">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6406">Un carácter seguido de siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6406">One character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6407">Una letra (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas) o un dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6407">One letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
-  <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6408">Siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6408">Seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6409">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6409">Checksum</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6555">Número de permiso de conducción de Eslovenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6555">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6556">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial sólo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial del número de permiso de la UE driver.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6556">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6557">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6557">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6558">Nueve dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6558">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6559">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6559">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6560">Nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6560">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6561">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6562">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6562">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6563">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6564">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6564">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6565">La expresión regular  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6565">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6566">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6566">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6582">Número de identificación nacional de Eslovenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6582">Slovenia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6583">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación nacional de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6583">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6584">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6584">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6585">13 dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6585">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6586">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6586">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6587">13 dígitos en el patrón especificado:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6587">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6588">Siete dígitos que corresponden a la fecha de nacimiento (DDMMLLL) donde "LLL" corresponde a los tres últimos dígitos del año de nacimiento.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6588">Seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6589">Dos dígitos que corresponden al área de nacimiento</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6589">Two digits that correspond to the area of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6590">Tres dígitos que corresponden a una combinación de sexo y número de serie de las personas nacidos el mismo día (000-499 para macho y 500-999 para hembras)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6590">Three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6591">Un dígito de control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6591">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6592">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6592">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6593">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6593">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6594">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6594">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6595">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6595">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6596">La función  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6596">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6597">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6597">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6598">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6598">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6599">La función  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6599">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- Slovenia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6627">Número de pasaporte de Eslovenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6627">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6628">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de pasaporte de UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6628">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6629">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6629">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6630">Dos letras seguidas de siete dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6630">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6631">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6631">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6632">Dos letras seguidas de siete dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6632">Two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6633">La letra "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6633">The letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6634">Una letra mayúscula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6634">One uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6635">Siete dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6635">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6636">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6636">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6637">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6637">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6638">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6638">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6639">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6639">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6640">La expresión regular  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6640">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6641">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6641">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6642">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6642">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6643">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6643">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6644">número de pasaporte número de pasaporte de Passport Passport no številka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6644">passport number slovenian passport number passport no številka potnega lista</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6645">Número de identificación fiscal de Eslovenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6645">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6646">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación de impuestos de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6646">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6647">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6647">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6648">Ocho dígitos sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6648">Eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6649">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6649">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6650">Ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6650">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6651">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6651">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6652">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6652">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6653">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6653">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6654">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6654">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6655">La función  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6655">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6656">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6656">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6657">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6657">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6658">La función  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6658">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_nation_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
