## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6682">Número de identificación de Sudáfrica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6682">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6683">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6684">13 dígitos que pueden contener espacios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6684">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6685">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6686">13 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6686">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6687">Seis dígitos en el formato DDMMAA que son la fecha de nacimiento </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6687">Six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6688">Cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6688">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6689">Un indicador de ciudadanía de un solo dígito </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6689">A single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6690">El dígito "8" o "9" </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6690">The digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6691">Un dígito que es un dígito de suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6691">One digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6692">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6692">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6693">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6693">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6694">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6694">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6695">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6695">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6696">La función Func_south_africa_identification_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6696">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6697">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_south_africa_identification_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6697">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6698">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6698">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6704">Número de registro de residente de Corea del sur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6704">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6705">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6705">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6706">13 dígitos que contienen un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6706">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6707">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6707">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6708">13 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6708">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6709">Seis dígitos en el formato DDMMAA que son la fecha de nacimiento </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6709">Six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6710">Un guión </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6710">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6711">Un dígito determinado por el siglo y el sexo </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6711">One digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6712">Código de región de nacimiento de cuatro dígitos </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6712">Four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6713">Un dígito que se usa para diferenciar a las personas para las cuales los números anteriores son idénticos </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6713">One digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6714">Un dígito de control.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6714">A check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6715">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6715">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6716">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6716">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6717">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6717">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6718">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6718">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6719">La función Func_south_korea_resident_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6719">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6720">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_south_korea_resident_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6720">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6721">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6721">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6722">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6722">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6723">La función Func_south_korea_resident_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6723">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6724">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6724">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6732">Número de permiso de conducción de España</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6732">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6733">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial sólo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial del número de permiso de la UE driver.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6733">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6735">Ocho dígitos seguidos de un carácter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6735">Eight digits followed by one character</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6737">Ocho dígitos seguidos de un carácter:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6737">Eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6741">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6741">Yes</span></span>


## <a name="spain-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6782">Número de identificación nacional de España</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6782">Spain national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6783">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación nacional de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6783">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6784">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6784">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6785">Siete dígitos seguidos de un carácter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6785">Seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6786">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6786">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6787">Siete dígitos seguidos de un carácter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6787">Seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6788">Siete dígitos </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6788">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6789">Un dígito o letra (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6789">One digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6790">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6790">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6791">No aplicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6791">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6792">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6792">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6793">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6793">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6794">La expresión regular  `Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6794">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6795">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6795">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Spain national identification number -->
 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6819">Número de pasaporte de España</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6819">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6820">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de pasaporte de UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6820">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6821">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6821">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6822">Una combinación de letras y números de ocho o nueve caracteres sin espacios ni delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6822">An eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6823">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6823">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6824">Una combinación de letras y números de ocho o nueve caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6824">An eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6825">Dos dígitos o letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6825">Two digits or letters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6827">Seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6827">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6828">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6828">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6829">No aplicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6829">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6830">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6830">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6831">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6831">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6832">La expresión regular  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6832">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6833">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6833">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6838">libro de Passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6838">passport book</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6839">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6839">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6840">n.º de pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6840">passport no</span></span>

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6845">Número de la seguridad social de España (NSS)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6845">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6846">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial se incluye en el número de la seguridad social de la UE o en el tipo de información confidencial del identificador equivalente y está disponible como entidad de tipo independiente de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6846">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6847">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6847">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6848">11 o 12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6848">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6849">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6849">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6850">11-12 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6850">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6851">Dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6851">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6852">Una barra diagonal (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6852">A forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6853">7-8 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6853">7-8 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6854">Una barra diagonal (opcional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6854">A forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6855">Dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6855">Two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6856">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6856">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6857">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6857">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6858">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6858">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6859">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6859">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6860">La función Func_spanish_social_security_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6860">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6861">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6861">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6862">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6862">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6863">Ninguno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6863">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6864">Número de identificación fiscal de España</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6864">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6865">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación de impuestos de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6865">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6866">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6866">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6867">Siete u ocho dígitos y una o dos letras en el patrón especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6867">Seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6868">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6868">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6869">Personas físicas españolas con una tarjeta de identidad nacional de España:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6869">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6870">Ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6870">Eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6871">Una letra mayúscula (distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6871">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6872">Spaniards no residente sin una tarjeta de identidad nacional de España</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6872">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6873">Una letra mayúscula "L" (distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6873">One uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6874">Siete dígitos </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6874">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6875">Una letra mayúscula (distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6875">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6876">Spaniards residente a la edad de 14 años sin una tarjeta de identidad nacional de España:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6876">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6877">Una letra mayúscula "K" (distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6877">One uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
-  <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6878">Siete dígitos </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6878">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6879">Una letra mayúscula (distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6879">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6880">Foreigners con un número de identificación de un extranjero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6880">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6881">Una letra mayúscula que es "X", "Y" o "Z" (distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6881">One uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6882">Siete dígitos </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6882">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6883">Una letra mayúscula (distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6883">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6884">Foreigners sin un número de identificación de un extranjero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6884">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6885">Una letra mayúscula que es "M" (distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6885">One uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6886">Siete dígitos </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6886">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6887">Una letra mayúscula (distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6887">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6888">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6888">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6889">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6889">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6890">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6890">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6891">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6891">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6892">La función  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6892">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6893">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6893">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6894">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6894">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6895">La función  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6895">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6926">Cadena de conexión de SQL Server</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6926">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6927">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6927">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6928">La cadena "User ID", "User ID", "UID" o "UserId" seguida de los caracteres y las cadenas que se describen en el patrón siguiente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6928">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6929">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6929">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6930">La cadena "User ID", "User ID", "UID" o "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6930">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6931">Cualquier combinación de entre 1-200 letras minúsculas o mayúsculas, dígitos, símbolos, caracteres especiales o espacios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6931">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6932">La cadena "Password" o "pwd" donde "pwd" no está precedida por una letra minúscula.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6932">The string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6933">Un signo igual (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6933">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6934">Cualquier carácter que no sea un signo de dólar ($), un símbolo de porcentaje (%), un símbolo mayor que (>), un símbolo de arroba (@), Comillas ("), punto y coma (;), llave izquierda ([) o corchete de apertura ({)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6934">Any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6935">Cualquier combinación de 7-128 caracteres que no sean un punto y coma (;), barra diagonal (/) o comillas (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6935">Any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6936">Un punto y coma (;) o comillas (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6936">A semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6937">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6937">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6938">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6938">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6939">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6939">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6940">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6940">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6941">La expresión regular CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6941">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6942">**No** se encuentra una palabra clave de CEP_GlobalFilter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6942">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6943">La expresión regular CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder **no** encuentra contenido que coincida con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6943">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6944">La expresión regular CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **no** encuentra contenido que coincida con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6944">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6972">Número de permiso de conducción de Suecia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6972">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6974">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6974">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6975">Diez dígitos que contienen un guión</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6975">Ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6976">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6976">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6977">Diez dígitos que contienen un guión:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6977">Ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6982">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6982">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6983">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6983">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6984">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6984">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6985">La expresión regular  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6985">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-6986">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-6986">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity> 
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7002">Identificación nacional de Suecia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7002">Sweden National ID</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7003">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial se incluye en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación nacional de la UE y está disponible como entidad de tipo independiente de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7003">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7004">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7004">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7005">10 o 12 dígitos y un delimitador opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7005">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7006">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7006">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7007">10 o 12 dígitos y un delimitador opcional:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7007">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7008">2-4 dígitos (opcionales)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7008">2-4 digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7009">Seis dígitos en fecha de formato AAMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7009">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7010">Delimitador de "-" o "+" (opcional), más</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7010">Delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional), plus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7011">Cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7011">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7012">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7012">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7013">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7013">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7014">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7014">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7015">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7015">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7016">La función Func_swedish_national_identifier encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7016">The function Func_swedish_national_identifier finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7017">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7017">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden National ID -->
<Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7018">Keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7018">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7019">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7019">No</span></span>
   
## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7020">Número de pasaporte de Suecia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7020">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7021">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial se incluye en el tipo de información confidencial de la UE número de pasaporte y está disponible como entidad de tipo independiente de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7021">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7022">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7022">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7023">Ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7023">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7024">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7024">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7025">Ocho dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7025">Eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7026">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7026">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7027">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7027">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7028">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7028">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7029">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7029">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7030">La expresión regular Regex_sweden_passport_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7030">The regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7031">Una de las siguientes opciones es verdadera:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7031">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7032">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_passport.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7032">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7033">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_sweden_passport.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7033">A keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7064">Número de la seguridad social de Suecia o identificación equivalente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7064">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7065">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el número de la seguridad social de la UE o el tipo de información confidencial del identificador equivalente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7065">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7066">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7066">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7067">12 dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7067">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7068">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7068">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7069">12 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7069">12 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7070">Ocho dígitos que corresponden a la fecha de nacimiento (AAAAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7070">Eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7071">Tres dígitos que corresponden a un número de serie en el que:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7071">Three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7072">El último dígito del número de serie indica el sexo por la asignación de un número impar para macho y un número par para hembras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7072">The last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7073">Hasta 1990, la asignación de número de serie que se corresponde con el condado en el que nació el portador del número o (si nació antes de 1947) donde estuvo viviendo, de acuerdo con los registros fiscales, el 1 de enero de 1947, con un código especial (por lo general, 9 como el séptimo dígito) para Immigrants</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7073">Up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7074">Un dígito de control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7074">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7075">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7075">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7076">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7076">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7077">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7077">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7078">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7078">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7079">La función  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7079">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7080">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7080">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7081">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7081">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7082">La función  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7082">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7098">Número de identificación fiscal de Suecia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7098">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7099">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación de impuestos de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7099">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7100">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7100">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7101">Diez dígitos y un símbolo en el patrón especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7101">Ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7102">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7102">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7103">Diez dígitos y un símbolo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7103">Ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7104">Seis dígitos que corresponden a la fecha de nacimiento (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7104">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7105">Un signo más, un signo menos o una barra diagonal inversa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7105">A plus sign, minus sign, or backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7106">Tres dígitos que hacen que el número de identificación sea único donde:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7106">Three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7107">Para los números emitidos antes 1990, el séptimo y el octavo dígito identifican el Condado de nacimiento o las personas que nación en el extranjero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7107">For numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7108">El dígito en la novena posición indica el género, ya sea impar o incluso para hembras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7108">The digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7109">Un dígito de control</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7109">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7110">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7110">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7111">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7111">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7112">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7112">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7113">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7113">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7114">La función  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7114">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7115">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7115">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7116">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7116">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7117">La función  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7117">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7143">Código SWIFT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7143">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7144">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7144">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7145">Cuatro letras seguidas de 5 a 31 letras o dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7145">Four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7146">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7146">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7147">Cuatro letras seguidas de 5-31 letras o dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7147">Four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7148">Código del banco de cuatro letras (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7148">Four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7149">Un espacio opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7149">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7150">4-28 letras o dígitos (el número básico de cuenta bancaria (BBAN))</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7150">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7151">Un espacio opcional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7151">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7152">1-3 letras o dígitos (el resto del BBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7152">1-3 letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7153">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7153">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7154">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7154">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7155">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7155">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7156">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7156">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7157">La expresión regular Regex_swift encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7157">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7158">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_swift.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7158">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7192">Número de identificación nacional de Taiwán</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7192">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7193">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7193">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7194">Una letra  seguida de nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7194">One letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7195">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7195">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7196">Una letra seguida de nueve dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7196">One letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7197">Una letra (en inglés, no distingue mayúsculas de minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7197">One letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7198">El dígito "1" o "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7198">The digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7199">Ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7199">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7200">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7200">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7201">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7201">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7202">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7202">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7203">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7203">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7204">La función Func_taiwanese_national_id encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7204">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7205">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_taiwanese_national_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7205">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7206">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7206">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7207">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7207">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7208">La función Func_taiwanese_national_id encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7208">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7209">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7209">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7226">Número de pasaporte de Taiwán</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7226">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7227">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7227">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7228">Número de pasaporte biométrico: nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7228">Biometric passport number: Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7230">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7230">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7231">Número de pasaporte biométrico:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7231">Biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7232">El dígito "3" </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7232">The digit "3"</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7235">Nueve dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7235">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7236">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7236">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7237">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7237">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7238">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7238">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7239">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7239">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7240">La expresión regular Regex_taiwan_passport encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7240">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7241">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_taiwan_passport.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7241">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7246">Passport no</span></span>

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7252">Número de certificado de residente (ARC/TARC) de Taiwán</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7252">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7253">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7253">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7254">10 letras y dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7254">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7255">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7255">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7256">10 letras y dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7256">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7257">Dos letras (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7257">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7258">Ocho dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7258">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7259">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7259">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7260">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7260">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7261">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7261">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7262">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7262">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7263">La expresión regular Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7263">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7264">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7264">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7278">Código de identificación de población tailandesa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7278">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7279">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7279">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7280">13 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7280">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7281">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7281">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7282">13 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7282">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7283">El primer dígito no es 0 ni 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7283">First digit is not 0 or 9</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7284">12 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7284">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7285">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7285">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7286">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7286">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7287">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7287">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7288">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7288">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7289">La función Func_Thai_Citizen_Id encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7289">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7290">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7290">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7291">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7291">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7292">La función Func_Thai_Citizen_Id encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7292">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7301">Número de identificación nacional de Turco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7301">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7302">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7302">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7303">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7303">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7304">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7304">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7305">11 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7305">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7306">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7306">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7307">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7307">Yes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7309">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7309">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7310">La función Func_Turkish_National_Id encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7310">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7311">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_Turkish_National_Id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7311">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7312">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7312">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7313">La función Func_Turkish_National_Id encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7313">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">

      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
```

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7320">RU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7320">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7321">número de permiso de conducción</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7321">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7322">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial se incluye en el tipo de información confidencial del número de licencia de conductor de la UE y está disponible como entidad de tipo independiente de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7322">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7323">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7323">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7324">Combinación de 18 letras y dígitos en el formato especificado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7324">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7325">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7325">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7326">18 letras y dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7326">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7327">Cinco letras (no distinguen entre mayúsculas y minúsculas) o el dígito "9" en lugar de una letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7327">Five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7328">Un dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7328">One digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7329">Cinco dígitos en el formato de fecha MMDDY para la fecha de nacimiento (el séptimo carácter aumenta en 50 si el impulsor es hembra, es decir, 51 a 62 en lugar de 01 a 12)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7329">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7330">Dos letras (no distinguen entre mayúsculas y minúsculas) o el dígito "9" en lugar de una letra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7330">Two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7331">Cinco dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7331">Five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7332">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7332">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7333">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7333">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7334">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7334">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7335">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7335">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7336">La función Func_uk_drivers_license encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7336">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7337">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_uk_drivers_license.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7337">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7338">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7338">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_uk_drivers_license"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7340">Keyword_uk_drivers_license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7340">Keyword_uk_drivers_license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7341">DVLA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7341">DVLA</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7343">quadbikes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7343">quadbikes</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7344">motor cars</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7344">motor cars</span></span>
