## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7356">RU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7356">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7357">número de álbum electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7357">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7358">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7358">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7359">Dos letras seguidas por entre 1 y 4 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7359">Two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7360">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7360">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7361">Dos letras (no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas) seguidas por entre 1 y 4 números</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7361">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7362">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7362">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7363">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7363">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7364">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7364">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7365">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7365">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7366">La expresión regular Regex_uk_electoral encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7366">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7367">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_uk_electoral.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7367">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7374">RU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7374">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7375">número de servicio nacional de salud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7375">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7376">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7376">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7377">De 10 a 17 dígitos separados por espacios</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7377">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7378">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7378">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7379">10-17 dígitos:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7379">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7380">3 o 10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7380">Either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7381">Un espacio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7381">A space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7382">Tres dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7382">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7383">Un espacio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7383">A space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7384">Cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7384">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7385">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7385">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7386">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7386">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7387">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7387">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7388">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7388">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7389">La función Func_uk_nhs_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7389">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7390">Una de las siguientes opciones es verdadera:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7390">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7391">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_uk_nhs_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7391">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7392">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_uk_nhs_number1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7392">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7393">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7393">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7394">Se supera la suma de comprobación.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7394">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7412">RU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7412">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7413">número de seguro nacional (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7413">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7414">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial se incluye en el tipo de información confidencial de Identificaiton Nacional de la UE y está disponible como entidad de tipo independiente de información confidencial.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7414">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7415">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7415">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7416">7 caracteres o 9 caracteres separados por espacios o guiones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7416">7 characters or 9 characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7417">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7417">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7418">Dos patrones posibles:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7418">Two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7419">Dos letras (los NINO válidos usan solo caracteres determinados en este prefijo, que valida este patrón; no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7419">Two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7420">Seis dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7420">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7421">' A ', ' B ', ' C ' o ' t ' (como el prefijo, solo se permiten determinados caracteres en el sufijo; no distingue entre mayúsculas y minúsculas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7421">Either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7422">O</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7422">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7423">Dos letras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7423">Two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7424">Un espacio o un guion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7424">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7425">Dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7425">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7426">Un espacio o un guion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7426">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7427">Dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7427">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7428">Un espacio o un guion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7428">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7429">Dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7429">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7430">Un espacio o un guion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7430">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7431">' A ', ' B ', ' C ' o ' t '</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7431">Either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7432">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7432">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7433">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7433">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7434">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7434">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7435">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7435">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7436">La función Func_uk_nino encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7436">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7437">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_uk_nino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7437">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7438">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7438">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7439">La función Func_uk_nino encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7439">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7440">No se encuentra ninguna palabra clave de Keyword_uk_nino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7440">No keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NINO -->
<Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7462">RU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7462">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7463">número de identificación fiscal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7463">tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7464">Esta entidad de tipo de información confidencial solo está disponible en el tipo de información confidencial de número de identificación de impuestos de la UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7464">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7465">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7465">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7466">Referencia fiscal única (UTR): 10 dígitos sin espacios y delimitadores</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7466">Unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR): 10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7467">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7467">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7468">Referencia de contribuyente única (UTR): 10 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7468">Unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR): 10 digits</span></span>

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7469">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7469">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7470">Sí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7470">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7471">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7471">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7472">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7472">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7473">La función  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` busca contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7473">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7474">Se encuentra una palabra clave de  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7474">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7494">Número de cuenta bancaria de Estados Unidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7494">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7495">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7495">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7496">Entre 8 y 17 dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7496">8-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7497">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7497">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7498">Entre 8 y 17 dígitos consecutivos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7498">8-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7499">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7499">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7500">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7500">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7501">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7501">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7502">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7502">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7503">La expresión regular Regex_usa_bank_account_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7503">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7504">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_usa_Bank_Account.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7504">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7534">Número de permiso de conducción de Estados Unidos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7534">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7535">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7535">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7536">Depende del estado</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7536">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7537">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7537">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7538">Depende del estado, por ejemplo, Nueva York:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7538">Depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7539">Nueve dígitos con formato como DDD DDD DDD coincidirán.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7539">Nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7540">Nueve dígitos como ddddddddd no coinciden con el formato.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7540">Nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7541">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7541">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7542">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7542">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7543">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7543">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7544">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7544">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7545">La función Func_new_york_drivers_license_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7545">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7546">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7546">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7547">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_us_drivers_license.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7547">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7548">Una directiva DLP está segura al 65% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7548">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7549">La función Func_new_york_drivers_license_number encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7549">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7550">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7550">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7551">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7551">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7552">No se encuentra ninguna palabra clave de Keyword_us_drivers_license.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7552">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7650">Número de identificación fiscal individual de Estados Unidos (ÉLEN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7650">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7651">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7651">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7652">Nueve dígitos que empiezan con un "9" y contienen un "7" u "8" como cuarto dígito; se puede optar por un formato con espacios o guiones</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7652">Nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7653">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7653">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7654">Con formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7654">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7655">El dígito "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7655">The digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7656">Dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7656">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7657">Un espacio o un guion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7657">A space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7658">Un "7" o "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7658">A "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7659">Un dígito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7659">A digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7660">Un espacio o un guion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7660">A space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7661">Cuatro dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7661">Four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7662">Sin formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7662">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7663">El dígito "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7663">The digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7664">Dos dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7664">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7665">Un "7" o "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7665">A "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7666">Cinco dígitos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7666">Five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7667">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7667">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7668">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7668">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7669">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7669">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7670">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7670">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7671">La función Func_formatted_itin encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7671">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7672">Al menos una de las siguientes opciones es verdadera:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7672">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7673">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_itin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7673">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7674">La función Func_us_address encuentra una dirección en el formato de fecha correcto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7674">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7675">La función Func_us_date encuentra una fecha en el formato de fecha correcto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7675">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7676">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_itin_collaborative.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7676">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7677">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7677">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7678">La función Func_unformatted_itin encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7678">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7679">Al menos una de las siguientes opciones es verdadera:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7679">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7680">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_itin_collaborative.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7680">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7681">La función Func_us_address encuentra una dirección en el formato de fecha correcto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7681">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7682">La función Func_us_date encuentra una fecha en el formato de fecha correcto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7682">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
<Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7684">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7684">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7685">contribuyente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7685">taxpayer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7686">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7686">tax id</span></span>

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7703">Número de la seguridad social de Estados Unidos (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7703">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7704">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7704">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7705">9 dígitos, que pueden ser un patrón con o sin formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7705">9 digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7706">Si se ha emitido antes de mediados de 2011, el SSN tiene un formato seguro en aquellas partes del número que deben incluirse dentro de ciertos rangos para que sean válidas (pero no hay ninguna suma de comprobación).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7706">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7707">Patrón</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7707">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7708">Cuatro funciones buscan SSN en cuatro patrones diferentes:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7708">Four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7709">Func_ssn busca SSN con formato seguro anteriores a 2011 y formateados con guiones o espacios (ddd-dd-dddd O ddd dd dddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7709">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7710">Func_unformatted_ssn busca SSN con formato seguro anteriores a 2011 y formateados de manera no específica como nueve dígitos consecutivos (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7710">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7711">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn busca SSN posteriores a 2011 y formateados con guiones o espacios (ddd-dd-dddd O ddd dd dddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7711">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7712">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn busca SSN posteriores a 2011 y formateados de manera no específica como nueve dígitos consecutivos (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7712">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7713">Suma de comprobación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7713">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7714">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7714">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7715">Definición</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7715">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7716">Una directiva DLP está segura al 85% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7716">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7717">La función Func_ssn encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7717">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7718">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7718">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7719">Una directiva DLP está segura al 75% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7719">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7720">La función Func_unformatted_ssn busca contenido que coincida con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7720">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7721">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7721">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7722">Una directiva DLP está segura al 65% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7722">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7723">La función Func_randomized_formatted_ssn encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7723">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7724">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7724">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7725">Una directiva DLP está segura al 55% de que este tipo de información confidencial se detecta si, en una proximidad de 300 caracteres:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7725">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7726">La función Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn encuentra contenido que coincide con el patrón.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7726">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="ecc2e-7727">Se encuentra una palabra clave de Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ecc2e-7727">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```
